settings.title: Give your  designer bag a second life
settings.desc:
Before anything else, we believe in quality & timelessness. By selling your perfectly maintained bag, you are helping us build a more responsible fashion industry.

Send us your old Jeune Premier bag between June 20th - July 20th 2023 and receive a shopping voucher up to â‚¬50.

Be sure to subscribe on our newsletter to be up to date about the second life project!
settings.link_txt: Read more about Jeune Premier Second life
settings.link_hover_txt: Read more about Jeune Premier Second life

settings.name: 1. Select your bag
settings.department: Login to you Jeune Premier Account. Select & photograph the Jeune Premier bag you wish to sell.

settings.name: 2. Get your quote
settings.department: As soon as we receive your request, we'll tell you how much shopping credit you could earn on selling your old Jeune Premier Bag.

settings.name: 3.  Send us the bag
settings.department: When we approve your request, you can ship your items by post using  our pre-paid label.

settings.name: 4. Receive your shopping voucher
settings.department:
Receive your voucher via email to shop on our oficial Jeune Premier website.
Have fun shopping!

settings.title: HERE'S HOW IT WORKS
settings.desc:
Give your precious designer bag a Second Life!
Earn Jeune Premier credit by selling your designer bag through our Second Life service in 4 easy steps.

settings.question: WHAT ITEM(S) CAN I SELL?
settings.answer:
We are currently only accepting Backpacks from the following collections: 2020, 2021 and 2022.
No accessories, pencilboxes, City Bags, Drinking Bottles,..

settings.question: FROM WHICH COUNTRIES CAN I SUBMIT SECOND LIFE REQUESTS?
settings.answer: Currently we only accept Second Life requests from Belgium, The Netherlands, France & Germany.

settings.question: I'VE SUBMITTED MY BAG(S). WHEN WILL I RECEIVE MY QUOTE?
settings.answer: We'll send your quote within five working days.

settings.question: WHEN WILL I RECEIVE MY JEUNE PREMIER SHOPPING VOUCHER?
settings.answer:
As soon as we receive & accept your request, you'll receive your first Shopping Voucher.
The first Shopping Voucher includes 50% of the quote you've received from us.
The second Shopping Voucher we'll be send to you when your bag is sold online.

settings.question: WHAT HAPPENS IF MY BAG DOESN'T SELL?
settings.answer:
No worries, we give your bag a new life anyway!
If the bag is not sold within 4 months, we will donate it to charity!
Read more about our charity project.

settings.question: HOW DOES THE TRADE-IN SERVICE WORK?
settings.answer:
The Jeune Premier Second Life trade-in offer is limited to residents from Belgium, France, The Netherlands & Germany.

Your item must be clean, undamaged & fully functional.

settings.question: IN WHAT CONDITION CAN I SEND MY BAG ?
settings.answer:
Your bag must be clean & have nog tears, holes, or stains.

If you still would like to give your bag a glam-up, you can buy the Jeune Premier cleaner here.

settings.title: I want to sell my Jeune Premier Bag.
settings.desc: Interested about our new Jeune Premier Second life project? Great! Subscribe via the link below to be up to date when to send your bag you want to sell.
settings.policies_text: Note: You can unsubscribe from the newsletter at any time. See our privacy policy and our general terms and conditions.

settings.title: Dirty bag?
settings.sub_title: No worries! We have the perfect solution for you.
settings.desc:
Just like a nice handbag, you shouldn't put a school backpack in the washing machine!

In order to give our bags the spotlight they deserve throughout their lifespan, we have teamed up with the renowned Belgian company Eres to develop a unique cleaning formula. The Jeune Premier Cleaner is a handy 100 ml spray.

You can easily spray it onto all Jeune Premier fabrics and rub it in with a damp cloth for excellent results!
